City Secretary
==============

Overview
--------

The City Secretary’s Office maintains all business and legal records, including [City Council](https://www.cityofkennedale.com/council) and [board](https://www.cityofkennedale.com/boards) actions.

City Secretary
--------------

* Agendas, Packets, and Minutes Creation
* Board and Commission Coordination
* Elections Administration
* Fulfillment of Requests for Public Information
* Records Management Officer (RMO)
* Event Planning and Publicity

Municipal clerks office achievement of excellence award
=======================================================

The City of Kennedale's City Secretary's Office received the Texas Municipal Clerk's Office Achievement of Excellence Award in 2025.

The program recognizes the statutory requirements and demands for the effective management of resources for proper governance by the municipal clerk's office. The award itself recognizes municipal clerk offices throughout the state for compliance with federal, state, and local statutes that govern standards necessary to fulfill the duties and responsibilities of the office. A municipal clerk's office must have met and demonstrated nine of the following 12 standards to be eligible to receive the award.

![TMCA Seal](https://www.cityofkennedale.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=8521)

* ### Records Management
* ### Professional Development/Certifications
* ### Government Transparency
* ### Elections
* ### Awards/Recognition
* ### Public Information Act

* ### Open Meetings Act
* ### Boards/Commissions
* ### Municipal Clerk Office Policies/Procedures
* ### Other Areas of Responsibility
* ### Innovation/Stream Line Projects
* ### Departmental Training
